name: DEUS EX MACHINA 2: REBOOT
blurb: The first multimedia video game that was ever made is rebooted! Starring Christopher Lee.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Ultra-high-definition download of the DEUS EX MACHINA 2 cover artwork, featuring the fabulous Chyna Whyne as The Machine.

The reward above plus ... DEUS EX MACHINA 2, THE GAME. Download your copy of the new game the moment it's released in the format of your choice. Check the FAQs for current list of available formats and release dates.
The rewards above plus ... ADDITIONAL COPY of DEUS EX MACHINA 2 in the ADDITIONAL FORMAT of your choice. Check the FAQs for current list of available formats and release dates.
All the rewards above, plus ... \r\nDEUS EX MACHINA 2 the SOUNDTRACK ALBUM, starring Christopher Lee and Ian Dury.

DEUS EX MACHINA: THE BEST GAME YOU NEVER PLAYED IN YOUR LIFE, the NEW E-BOOK from Mel Croucher. Hilarious, heartbreaking, no-holds-barred, inside story of how the video games industry started and where it's all heading.
Oops! Sorry folks, the \u00a318 reward above should begin with the words "All the rewards above ... plus". To be clear, every backer at \u00a318 and over gets a copy of Mel's new book ...

all the rewards above, plus ... \r\nExclusive, fully playable emulation of the ORIGINAL 1984 version of DEUS EX MACHINA (ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64 versions), including the original soundtrack, starring "Dr. Who" Jon Pertwee.
all the rewards above, plus ... \r\nNO-LIMIT DOWNLOADS of behind-the-scenes content: character sheets, alternate concepts, artwork, deleted stuff, interviews, and work-in-progress of new material.
all the rewards above, plus ... \r\nLimited edition "backers only" DEUS EX MACHINA 2 POSTER. Signed by Mel Croucher with the personalised dedication of your choice.
all the rewards above, plus ... DEUS EX MACHINA ORIGINAL 1984 DESIGN POSTER. Signed by Mel Croucher with the personalised dedication of your choice.
All the rewards above, plus ... \r\nYOUR NAME in the on-screen credits of the game itself, all copies, all formats.

All the rewards above, plus ...\r\nYOUR FACE in the final sequence of the game itself, all copies, all formats. Join Sir Christopher Lee and the rest of the cast and crew to appear in the spectacular closing sequence of the game for the whole world to see.

All the rewards above, plus ...\r\nCOLLECTOR'S BOX ULTIMATE EDITION: DEUS EX MACHINA original 1984 version on DVD, DEUS EX MACHINA original 1984 soundtrack album on CD, DEUS EX MACHINA original design poster, DEUS EX MACHINA: THE BEST GAME YOU NEVER PLAYED IN YOUR LIFE big fat glossy printed book, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 the game on DVD, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 soundtrack album CD ... all signed by the author with customised dedications of your choice - plus - your copy of the limited edition DEUS EX MACHINA 2 poster with celebration signatures by members of the team and members of the cast.
All the rewards above, plus ... you will be featured as ASSOCIATE PRODUCER in the CREDIT SEQUENCE of the game itself, all copies, all formats.
All the rewards above, plus ... you will be featured as ASSOCIATE PRODUCER on the LOADING PAGE and in the credit sequence of the game itself, all copies, all formats.
All the rewards above, plus ... 1 hour no-holds-barred Skype call with the team.
All the rewards above, plus ... Unique item. The original boxed AUTOMATA ZX SPECTRUM, signed by Mel Croucher and the original coder Andrew Stagg.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA session tape of FRANKIE HOWERD as the Defect Police. This unique item is the "wild recording" of the entire session from 1984, on the original open-reel boxed tape.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA session tape of JON PERTWEE as the Narrator. This unique item is the "wild recording" of the entire session from 1984, on the original open-reel boxed tape.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA session tape of IAN DURY as the Fertilizer. This unique item is the "wild recording" of the entire session from 1984, on the original open-reel boxed tape.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA MASTER TAPES. This unique item is the final production recording of the 1984 soundtrack, on the original two reels of open-reel boxed tape.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA 2 concept art, storyboards and graphics sheets. This unique item is the complete collection of ALL the original artwork, signed by the creators and dedicated to you.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA concept art, storyboards and graphics sheets. This unique item is the complete collection of ALL the original 1984 hand-drawn artwork, signed by the creators and dedicated to you.
